backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profile and resume CRUD with role-based access control and auto-promotion of authenticated users to the user role.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Android install popup and related functionality to involved files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their functionality for routing, storage, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the PWA including manifest, icons, service worker registration, and font imports.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, scope, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install-time asset caching, cache cleanup, and network‑first fetch handling with offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React setup configuring TanStack Router routes and theme provider with global toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer displaying attribution, external link, and privacy policy navigation.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding, PWA install control, sync badge, and authentication UI.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main layout with header, footer, routing outlet, and triggers pending resume sync when online and authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Renders login/logout controls using Internet Identity and displays the user's name when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/pwa/AndroidInsta: Shows an Android‑specific delayed popup prompting PWA installation with dismissal and cooldown logic.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallCo: Provides an install button for PWA installation or fallback instructions when native prompts are unavailable.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallIn: Dialog explaining manual PWA installation steps for iOS, Android, and desktop browsers.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeFor: UI panel allowing users to select resume template, font, and color theme, updating formatting state via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumePre: Displays a scaled, scrollable preview of the resume using the template renderer inside a sticky card.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumePri: Renders the resume template in a print-only container for printing or PDF export.
frontend/src/components/resume/sections/: Editor for adding, removing, and editing achievements with fields for title, date, and description.
Editor managing a list of certifications, allowing creation, deletion, and editing of certification details.
Form editor for education entries, supporting institution, degree, dates, current status, and description.
Editor for work experience entries with fields for company, position, location, dates, and description.
Simple editor for managing a list of hobbies, allowing adding, removing, and renaming items.
Provides a UI editor for adding, removing, and editing language entries in a resume, handling state updates for name and proficiency.
Renders an interface to manage project entries, allowing users to add, remove, and edit details such as name, dates, description, and links.
Implements a skill management editor that supports adding skills, removing them, and modifying names and proficiency levels.
frontend/src/components/resume/templates: Renders a full resume template using provided content and formatting, including sections like summary, experience, education, and skills.
frontend/src/components/ResumeEditorForm: Form for editing resume title, personal info, summary, and all resume sections, updating the parent on changes.
Displays online/offline status and shows last sync time and pending sync changes for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAndroidInstallPopu: Tracks whether an Android install popup was dismissed, persisting a 7‑day cooldown in localStorage with functions to dismiss or clear state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user’s profile from the backend actor, managing loading state in coordination with actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Returns the browser’s current online/offline state and updates reactively based on network events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Implements a hook that detects PWA install readiness, tracks install state, and exposes a prompt function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on backend resumes and user profiles via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumes.ts: Combines local and backend resume storage with syncing logic and CRUD mutations using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theming variables, print rules, and resume-specific font and color classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the application's privacy policy using styled card components.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeEditor.tsx: Resume editor page that loads a resume, manages draft state, supports saving, PDF export, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ResumesDashboard.tsx: React dashboard for listing, creating, renaming, duplicating, and deleting resumes with dialogs and error handling.
frontend/src/storage/resumeLocalStore.ts: Manages localStorage-based resume CRUD with fallback in-memory storage and version migration.
frontend/src/storage/resumeSyncQueue.ts: Implements a localStorage-backed sync queue for offline operations with events and timestamp tracking.
frontend/src/types/resume.ts: Defines TypeScript types and default structures for resumes, sections, content, and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Extracts user-friendly error messages and detects storage-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates simple unique IDs for list items.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Exports a resume to PDF by triggering the browser's print dialog with a sanitized filename.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Android, iOS, or desktop environments based on user agent and pointer type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, version, and feature list for an ICP-based resume builder application.
